He scored the first two touchdowns of his comeback in a December 2009 rout of the Falcons at the Dome.`` I'll never forget this day,'' an emotional Michael Vick said after the game. I'll never forget coming back to the city of Atlanta. I'll never forget arriving yesterday. I'll never forget seeing a lot of the landmarks I used to see when I lived in this city for six years. I'll never forget shedding a tear on the bus ride over here this morning because I took that route every Sunday to come here and play. Former Brave Jeff Francoeur signed a sweet deal with the Royals. child in a camp,'' Angelina Jolie said after her visit Wednesday to Ban Ki-moon Mai Nai Soi camp, home to 18111 mainly Karenni registered refugees, just three kms from the Myanmar border, near Mae Hong Son. With no foreseeable chance that these refugees will soon be able to return to Burma( Myanmar), we must find some way to help them work and become self reliant, she said. The 111000 registered refugees who live in nine camps in northern Thailand along the Thai-Myanmar border are not allowed to venture outside the camps to work or receive higher education. shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
